text: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines has been in six Summer Olympic Games. The country has been in the Winter Olympic Games.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), Saint Vincent ; retrieved 2012-8-2. As of 2010, no athlete from Saint Vincent and the Grenadines has ever won an Olympic medal. The St Vincent and the Grenadines National Olympic Committee was formed in 1982 and recognized by the IOC in 1987.Olympic.org, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines; retrieved 2012-8-2. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * St Vincent and the Grenadines National Olympic Committe (SVNOC) website * Saint Vincent and the Grenadines profile at London2012.com Category:Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines at the Olympics
